name: average (Lorg Once Was)
description:
Game made at GameChanger 3.33 in 2 days
GameChanger is a hackathon for civil society activists and an opportunity to work with gamification specialists, IT developers and illustrators to create prototypes of gamified solutions.

Activist - Deniz Nazar
Programmist - Maxim Klimenok
Illustrator -Alina Kugush
Game Designer - me, your humble servant

A game for Central Asian adolescents with the aim of reducing the burden of the ideology of assessing a person only by his achievements, which can be indicated in the CV and helping adolescents think about what they really want.
